title: Lost functionality on websites since November 2020 update.
content:
Since the November 2020 update, I am unable to attach pictures within a website. The attach paperclip icon is present, but the functionality to browse for a picture or document does not function.

Similarly, when in a chat window and wanting to share my back camera the functionality to change has become lost, nor can I see a video preview, or any audio controls.

All the above worked fine before the update.
